name: Tanker
description: A tanker have a lot of health points and can ignore some weak enemy units.

name: Fighter
description: A fighter have a great attack and can cause a lot of damage to enemy units.

name: Mages
description: A mage can destroy his enemies with spells and mystic abilities.

name: Shooter
description: A shooter have a great attack and range, but a shooter have few health points.

name: Support
description: A support can block enemies and make allies stronger.
